member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection
member.summary: Connection parameters.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.Region
member.summary: Region selection, default EUNorth1. Undefined doesn't select region.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Credentials are loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.CredentialsType
member.summary: Type of AWS Credentials. See more https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sdkfornet1/latest/apidocs/html/T_Amazon_Runtime_AWSCredentials.htm

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.AccessKey
member.summary: Access key used in AmazonSQS connection

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.SecretKey
member.summary: Secret key used in AmazonSQS connection

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Connection.SessionToken
member.summary: Session token for SessionAWSCredentials.

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Input
member.summary: Input parameters.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Input.QueueUrl
member.summary: Queue url. Examples: https://{REGION_ENDPOINT}/queue.|api-domain|/{YOUR_ACCOUNT_NUMBER}/{YOUR_QUEUE_NAME}

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Input.MaxNumberOfMessages
member.summary: The maximum number of messages to return. Amazon SQS never returns more messages than this value (however, fewer messages might be returned). Valid values: 1 to 10.

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Options
member.summary: Options parameters.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Options.DeleteMessageAfterReceiving
member.summary: Delete message(s) from queue after receiving it

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Options.VisibilityTimeout
member.summary: The duration (in seconds) that the received messages are hidden from subsequent retrieve requests after being retrieved by a ReceiveMessage request.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Options.WaitTimeSeconds
member.summary: The duration (in seconds) for which the call waits for a message to arrive in the queue before returning. If a message is available, the call returns sooner than WaitTimeSeconds. If no messages are available and the wait time expires, the call returns successfully with an empty list of messages.

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Result
member.summary: Result.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Result.ContentLength
member.summary: Length of the received content.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Result.StatusCode
member.summary: Status code of the operation.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Result.Messages
member.summary: List of received messages.

member.name: P:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Definitions.Result.ResponseMetadata
member.summary: Information about the request.

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.AWSCredentialsType
member.summary: AWS credentials types.

member.name: F:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.AWSCredentialsType.AnonymousAWSCredentials
member.summary: Anonymous credentials. Using these credentials, the client does not sign the request.

member.name: F:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.AWSCredentialsType.BasicAWSCredentials
member.summary: Basic set of credentials consisting of an AccessKey and SecretKey

member.name: F:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.AWSCredentialsType.EnvironmentAWSCredentials
member.summary: Credentials that are retrieved from ConfigurationManager.AppSettings

member.name: F:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.AWSCredentialsType.SessionAWSCredentials
member.summary: Session credentials consisting of AccessKey, SecretKey and Token

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.Enums.Region
member.summary: AWS regions.

member.name: T:Frends.AmazonSQS.Receive.AmazonSQS
member.summary: Amazon S3 Task.
